command.text: &ExportImportTemplateQuery; if &Tiny.External.ConfigEvent; = 1 select '1' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName; else select '0' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName;

field.name: tk
field.check: tk not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1 and tk_cn = 1)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh)

field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where year(ngay_ks) >= @nam)⩓not exists(select 1 from dccdkh b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.tk = b.tk and @@table.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and b.nam = @nam) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from dccdkh b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.tk = b.tk and @@table.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and b.nam = @nam) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: tk
field.check: tk not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1 and tk_cn = 1)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh)

processing.text:
declare @message nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @y int, @d datetime, @year int, @inputYearOpening bit, @inputCustomerBalance bit select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @d = getDate() select @inputCustomerBalance = case when val = 1 then 1 else 0 end from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_cn_dn'
if @admin = 0 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'CustomerBalanceAdjustment', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end
-- Checking &Checking; &EndErrorMode; update @@table set du_co_nt00 = 0 where du_no_nt00 <> 0 update @@table set du_co00 = 0 where du_no00 <> 0
if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from dccdkh b where b.nam = @nam and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh)
select distinct ma_dvcs, tk into #c from @@table select a.* into #k from @@table a join dccdkh b on b.nam = @nam and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh)
-- Insert &Inserting;
insert into cdkh (nam, ma_dvcs, tk, ma_kh, du_no00, du_co00, du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00, du_no1, du_co1, du_no_nt1, du_co_nt1, dien_giai, ma_nt, ty_gia, ma_vv, status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select @nam, ma_dvcs, tk, ma_kh, du_no00, du_co00, du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00, 0, 0, 0, 0, '', '', 0, '', '1', getdate(), getdate(), 0, 0 from @@table a where not exists (select 1 from cdkh where nam = @nam and tk = a.tk and ma_dvcs = a.ma_dvcs and ma_kh = a.ma_kh)
update cdkh set du_no00 = b.du_no00, du_co00 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt00 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdkh a join @@table b on a.nam = @nam and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh
if not exists(select 1 from dmstt where nam_bd = @nam) update cdkh set du_no1 = b.du_no00, du_co1 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt1 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt1 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdkh a join @@table b on a.nam = @nam and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh
update dmkh set du13 = du13 + (b.du_no00 - b.du_co00) from dmkh a join (select ma_kh, sum(du_no00) as du_no00, sum(du_co00) as du_co00 from @@table group by ma_kh) b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh
select @year = nam_bd, @inputYearOpening = case when month(ngay_ky1) = month(ngay_dn2) and day(ngay_ky1) = day(ngay_dn2) then 0 else 1 end from dmstt if @nam > 0 begin if @nam > @year select @inputYearOpening = 0 select @year = @nam end
insert into cdtk(nam, ma_dvcs, tk, du_no00, du_co00, du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00, du_no1, du_co1, du_no_nt1, du_co_nt1, status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select @year, ma_dvcs, tk, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, '1', getdate(), getdate(), 0, 0 from #c a where not exists(select 1 from cdtk b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and b.nam = @year)
if @type = '1' and exists(select 1 from #k) begin select a.ma_kh, sum(a.du_no00 - a.du_co00) as du into #old from cdkh a join #k b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where a.nam = @year group by a.ma_kh
&Updating; and a.nam = @nam
update cdkh set du_no00 = b.du_no00, du_co00 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt00 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdkh a join #k b on a.nam = @nam and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh
if not exists(select 1 from dmstt where nam_bd = @nam) update cdkh set du_no1 = b.du_no00, du_co1 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt1 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt1 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdkh a join #k b on a.nam = @nam and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh
update dmkh set du13 = du13 + isnull(b.du, 0) - isnull(c.du, 0) from dmkh a join (select ma_kh, sum(du_no00 - du_co00) as du from #k group by ma_kh) b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh join #old c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh end
-- Account Balance select a.tk, a.ma_dvcs, sum(a.du_no00) as du_no00, sum(a.du_co00) as du_co00, sum(a.du_no_nt00) as du_no_nt00, sum(a.du_co_nt00) as du_co_nt00, sum(a.du_no1) as du_no1, sum(a.du_co1) as du_co1, sum(a.du_no_nt1) as du_no_nt1, sum(a.du_co_nt1) as du_co_nt1 into #cdkh from cdkh a join #c b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk where nam = @year group by a.tk, a.ma_dvcs
if @inputYearOpening = 0 update cdtk set du_no00 = b.du_no00, du_co00 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt00 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00 = b.du_co_nt00, du_no1 = b.du_no00, du_co1 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt1 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt1 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdtk a join #cdkh b on a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs where a.nam = @year else begin if @inputCustomerBalance = 0 update cdtk set du_no00 = b.du_no00, du_co00 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt00 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdtk a join #cdkh b on a.tk = a.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs where a.nam = @year else update cdtk set du_no00 = a.du_no00, du_co00 = a.du_co00, du_no_nt00 = a.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00 = a.du_co_nt00, du_no1 = a.du_no1, du_co1 = a.du_co1, du_no_nt1 = a.du_no_nt1, du_co_nt1 = a.du_co_nt1 from cdtk a join #cdkh b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk where a.nam = @year end
